text: O tekh zhe, kto vozdvig mechet', Chtoby nechestiye i smutu seyat' I tem vnesti raskol sred' vernykh, A takzhe dlya zasady tem, Kto ran'she voyeval s Allakhom i poslannikom Yego, - Oni zhe, nesomnenno, budut klyast'sya: "Zhelali lish' blagogo my!" - O nikh - svidetel'stvo Allakha: Oni, poistine, lzhetsy
